introduction: Do you have a balanced news diet? Go to https://ground.news/KiN to see reporting from a variety of s

vocabulary.example: The company faced an unprecedented challenge when their main supplier went bankrupt.

vocabulary.definition: relating to the structure of populations
vocabulary.example: The demographic shift towards an aging population poses challenges for healthcare systems.

vocabulary.definition: make or become unlikely to change, fail, or decline
vocabulary.example: Efforts are being made to stabilize the economy amidst the ongoing financial crisis.

vocabulary.definition: estimations or forecasts about future trends based on current data
vocabulary.example: The business team presented their sales projections for the upcoming quarter.

vocabulary.definition: relating to existence or the nature of human existence
vocabulary.example: The novel delves into deep existential questions about life and purpose.

vocabulary.definition: the tendency to work excessively hard and long hours
vocabulary.example: His workaholism led to burnout and affected his personal life negatively.
